system.description:
You have rebuilt yourself, and become stronger for it.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Cyborg, you must have taken technology to a new level. This is arbitrary and up for player interpretation, but generally, if you want to be the Cyborg, you have to do technology things first.

The Cyborg starts with a Cyborg Custom Move of their choice.

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.aHjDgmJ9zwT72lCD]{BRIDGE TO ANYWHERE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.ESCiLTWLFjJvBk2b]{BRILLIANT INVENTOR}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.hxnQ69oDOAOxSLBH]{FORGING A NEW FUTURE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.C8q0gViOqXMmyt6S]{HAND CANNON}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.m63XVUDZOpvQox9j]{ICARUS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.cyborg.Item.tqZrOa6tuYqbJYfc]{ROBOTIC BITS}

advancements.name: Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
